name: Sonic Universe: Dan4ik Project - Demo
description:
In the game, the main character is my fictional character named dan4ik, which stands for danchik.

I worked on the project for more than two months. I plan to add a game for four characters - danchik, tails, knuckles, sonic. Sonic with boost capability. And I hope with a homing attack. Wisps.

Please do not pass by and check out this project

Thanks!
